jdbcService.sql:
select n.id, n.created, n.modified, n.started, n.stopped, n.owner_id, n.verified, n.enabled, n.parent_id, n.version, n.priority, n.name, n.title, n.description, n.path, n.slug, n.language_id, n.component_id from nodes n join group_roles gr on n.path like '%' || gr.node_id || '%' -- on n.id = gr.node_id join groups g on gr.group_id = g.id join user_groups ug on g.id = ug.group_id join users u on ug.user_id = u.id join roles r on gr.role_id = r.id join action_roles ar on ar.role_id = r.id join actions a on ar.action_id = a.id where u.id = :userId and a.name = :action and (:componentId is null or n.component_id = :componentId)
-- must be set to inherit or must be equal and (gr.inherit = true or gr.node_id = n.id)
